title: Solar Watch for Wear
summary: Get the sunrise and sunset times from your Android Wear watch!
developerAddress:
Yu Chen Hou
Suite 101
161 University Ave. West
Waterloo Ontario Canada
N2L 3E5
description: Get the sunrise and sunset times from your Android Wear watch! To start the app... just say "Start Solar Watch" on Google Now or launch it as an app!The app currently tells you the time until the next sunset on top and sunrise on the bottom.
descriptionHTML:
Get the sunrise and sunset times from your Android Wear watch! To start the app... just say "Start Solar Watch" on Google Now or launch it as an app!

The app currently tells you the time until the next sunset on top and sunrise on the bottom.
comments: Pretty handy, does what it should!
